heroSubtitle: Get in touch with our support team. We're here to help with any questions or technical issues you may have.
formDescription: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

faqItems.question: How quickly will I receive a response?
faqItems.answer: We typically respond to all inquiries within 24 hours during business days.

faqItems.question: What information should I include?
faqItems.answer: Please include your account details, specific error messages, and steps to reproduce the issue.

faqItems.question: Is there emergency support available?
faqItems.answer: Yes, for urgent issues, use high-priority {{email}} or {{phone}}.
